about_the_game:
Welcome to Mall Heist - A Stealthy Adventure!
In Mall Heist, you're not just a cunning thief; you're an elite agent for a mall security testing agency. Your ultimate challenge: to expose the mall's security flaws by executing flawless heists. Confront guards, hack systems, and highlight the vulnerabilities of the mall's security.

Stealth is Your Greatest Weapon
Move silently, hide in the shadows, and avoid detection. Your stealth skills will determine your success. Use your environment to stay out of sight and execute perfect heists, proving the effectiveness of your agency's security testing methods.



Gadget Galore
What’s a heist without some ingenious improvisation? From the slippery banana peel in the grocery aisle to the distraction of a well-placed boot from the shoe store, your environment is your arsenal. Think on your feet and use these unexpected items to outmaneuver guards and advance your heist.



Chase and Escape
Evading guards is just the beginning. If spotted, you'll need to run, dodge, and use your environment to escape, including a trusty melee weapon for those close encounters. These high-stakes scenarios put your evasion tactics to the test.



Dynamic Guards
Our AI guards are no pushovers; they patrol, chase, and respond to your actions. Stay alert, as one wrong move could have you surrounded. Their advanced AI behavior makes for a realistic security testing scenario.


Ready for the Heist of a Lifetime?
Mall Heist is more than just a game; it’s a test of your strategy, speed, and stealth. With artistic charm and a light-hearted approach to the stealth genre, get ready to embark on a heist spree that will keep you coming back for more! Prove your prowess as a top-notch security testing agent and expose the vulnerabilities of the most secure malls!
